Summary: moving green light in the distance, coming from the ground and moving across the sky; at least two occasions
divs: Sighting DetailsOn a (moving)Greyhound bus in the Montana countryside the night of July 31 - August 1, 1975. On at least two different occasions, maybe 20-30 minutes apart, I saw a moving beam of green light in the distance toward the hills off to my left. It was coming from the ground and traversing the sky. I thought it might have been an artificial device to help aircraft see at night. I just wonder what it was. (Years later I learned there were notable UFO sightings in Montana in mid and late 1975, which added to my curiosity.)
